name: Cookie Crawler
description:
JamNation + Unity : gamejam 23-25 nov 2018
Team : TANKAT

Programming  : Rose Hirigoyen, Arthur Fournier, Pierre-Yves Jourel

Art : Juliette Hirigoyen

Description : Join/Create a network game by pressing spacebar/touchscreen. When 4 players are connected, game starts. The goal is to move your cookie to find the jar in a topdown dungeon with fire and spikes. Each player can move in one direction (up/down/left/right) using the SPACEBAR on his Windows/Mac/Linux or touchscreen on Android phone/wear, symbolized by the arrow of his color next to the cookie. Have fun ! :) The cookie goes back to the start position if killed by fire or spikes. Go back to title screen after you win by pressing SPACE/screen.
